page.title: 04AN AUTOBIOGRAPHY
page.content: Most of my relatives live in New- castle, but one of my Aunties lives in Alnwick. I was born in Newcastle General Hospital in 1973.I lived in Newcastle until 1981 then I lived in Blackpool till 1982, then I lived in Alnwick till 1983, and now I live in Widdrington. My hobbies are swimming, dancing and writing. I swim a lot at Gosforth swimming and leisure centre. My favourite singers are Michael Jackson and Duran Duran. I can sit and listen to them all evening. I collect rubbers, stickers, key rings, stamps and teddy bears. I have two pen pals, one lives in Austria and one in America. I hope to visit them one day.
